document_data.name: Gurrash
document_data.mainbody: '''Gurrash''' was the war chief of the [[Ear Seekers]] tribe sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], Gurrash led his orcs against the [[elves]] of the [[Ardeep Forest]], but they were defeated. An injured Gurrash guided his fellows in retreat to the [[Nightstone]] village.
